review: The doctor is patient in listening to the concerns and  understands the person. Would recommend him anytime

Dr Deepak was really sweet and took real good care of my wife. He dianosed the problem instantly, took immediate action and followed up with us regularly to make sure that the problem was resolved. Very refreshing experience!!!
The doctor was extremely friendly. He explained everything clearly so that we could understand the details of the surgery.  We  were totally satisfied

review: Dr.Deepak Shivratri is an amazing, Patient friendly Doctor. He performed my knee surgery two years back and is one of the best Ortho surgeons
The doctor did not even consult even though an appointment was booked... Pathetic service. If not available should inform
gives accurate information and friendly.  very polite doctor whom we have across. He understands patients difficulties.

********* ******* He's very calm and listens to our problems & answers to all our queries &  doesn't ask us to take  unnecessary tests and x rays like some of the surgeons do. Will definitely recommend him to all orthopedic related problems.

**** ******** ******.He talks very gently and respectfully.
Good at knee surgeries.. No complaints..
